text.tspan: Contribution to global mean surface temperature rise by gas, World,
The global mean surface temperature change as a result of a country or region's cumulative emissions of three gases â€“ carbon
Note: This does not include cooling impacts from sulphur dioxide and aerosols, so the net warming can be lower.
Data source: Jones et al. (2023). National contributions to climate change due to historical emissions of carbon dioxide,
